description:
With installation latest code by devstack, this error happened when I launched a compute instance from horizion. It blocked me to launch any VM. I checked the directory of /etc/libvirt/nwfilter and could not  find that file name 'nova-instance-instance-00000002-fa163e997fca.xml' thrown in the error log.

title: libvir: Network Filter error : Network filter not found: Could not find filter

comments.content:
With installation latest code by devstack, this error happened when I launched a compute instance from horizion. It blocked me to launch any VM. I checked the directory of /etc/libvirt/nwfilter and could not  find that file name 'nova-instance-instance-00000002-fa163e997fca.xml' thrown in the error log.


=================ls /etc/libvirt/nwfilter/=======================

drwxr-xr-x 5 root root 4096  4月 25  2012 ..
